page.title: 08RECREATION FACILITIES
page.content: Alness provides many leisure facilities which include a Bowling Green,swimming pool,Averon Community Centre, Averon Youth Club, Golf Club and Alness Academy sports hall and fields. At the Averon Centre there are squash courts, a large games hall used for football,badminton and hockey. A smaller hall is used for indoor bowling,keepfit,discos and travelling exhibitions. Alness Academy's sports halls, playing fields and swimming pool are all used by various clubs after school hours. There are large areas where children and teenagers can play on bikes or motorbikes. There are also a number of organisations open to children between the ages of 7-17, including Cubs, Guides, Scouts, Brownies and Venture Scouts.
